title: Bert

properties.value: Bert is a worker in Yanille and is a key figure in The Hand in the Sand quest. After the quest, players can speak to him (or use the right-click option on him) once per day to have him deliver 84 buckets of sand to their bank. Doing this is a requirement for the Medium Ardougne Diary (Ultimate Ironmen may instead fill a bucket at Bert's sand pit to fill this requirement). He will automatically deliver the sand each day if the player has completed the Elite Ardougne Diary, and can be spoken to in order to toggle this on or off if it is not wanted. This effect continues even if the player loses membership.

SMW Subobject for After QuestNPC location: YanilleUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 5819Examine: Bert seems to be covered in sand from head to toe.Release date: 16 April 2015Image: File:Bert.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Bert

Bert is a worker in Yanille and is a key figure in The Hand in the Sand quest. After the quest, players can speak to him (or use the right-click option on him) once per day to have him deliver 84 buckets of sand to their bank. Doing this is a requirement for the Medium Ardougne Diary (Ultimate Ironmen may instead fill a bucket at Bert's sand pit to fill this requirement). He will automatically deliver the sand each day if the player has completed the Elite Ardougne Diary, and can be spoken to in order to toggle this on or off if it is not wanted. This effect continues even if the player loses membership.

He can be contacted using the NPC Contact spell in the Lunar spellbook.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 April 2015
(update)

The "Toggle-notification" option was changed to only appear after The Hand in the Sand is complete.

9 April 2015
(update)

Fixed typos in Bert's notification toggle.

5 March 2015
(update)

The "Toggle-notification" right-click option was added.
